properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 3 at 9:41PM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS CONTINUE INTO THIS WEEKEND...
...LOCALLY DENSE FOG ACROSS THE SOUTHERN WATERS TONIGHT...

.A strong cold front will approach the region tonight and pass
through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to 30 knots
this evening over the coastal waters, becoming west to northwest
and increasing to 30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night
into Sunday morning.

* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to less than one mile. For the Small Craft
Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 4 to 7 feet. For the Gale Watch, northwest winds 25
to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet possible.

* WHERE...S of Cape Lookout to N of Surf City NC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 4 AM EST Saturday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM EST Saturday. For the
Gale Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Low visibility
will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
